channel.title: Comments on: WordPress 2.7 Admin UI Survey

item.title: By: William
item.dc:creator: William
item.description: I am using wordpress 2.7 and I love the user Interphase. Only problem is that some of my old plugins are not showing configuration pages after updating. Still I am happy with it.
item.content:encoded: I am using wordpress 2.7 and I love the user Interphase. Only problem is that some of my old plugins are not showing configuration pages after updating. Still I am happy with it.
